name: Move And Dodge 3D
description:
Think Big, Play Hard #BadaSoch

With this moto, AnindyaRoyTheTechMaster presents to you a brand new casual 3D game. A game based on casual theme, this game provides you a tough challanging environment where you have to collect all the coins in the level without hitting any of the enemy.
You start off as a ball in a Lego Maze, with a ton of enemies moving around. Your only aim is to collect all the coins in the level. Though this is a casual game, it is not meant to be played casually. This game is SO HARD that only a very skilled gamer can complete it.
